channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (short_term)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Kelly Chen @ Chase Center
item.description: 2025-12-20 04:00 — Kelly Chen at Chase Center. Kelly Chen is a prominent figure in the Asian pop scene, and her live performances are known for their high energy and emotional depth.

item.description: 2025-12-15 03:00 — Not So Silent Night at SAP Center at San Jose. Not So Silent Night features a mix of popular alt and indie acts, making it a highly anticipated event in the Bay Area music scene.

item.description: 2025-12-11 04:00 — The Mountain Goats at The Fillmore. The Mountain Goats have a cult following and are known for their engaging live shows, making this a must-see performance.

item.description: 2025-12-13 03:00 — Waterparks at The Fillmore. Waterparks is known for their dynamic live shows and strong fan engagement, making this tour highly anticipated.

item.description: 2025-12-22 04:00 — The Allman Betts Family Revival at The Fillmore. The Allman Betts Family Revival brings together a talented lineup that honors the legacy of the Allman Brothers, appealing to classic rock fans.

item.description: 2025-12-21 04:00 — Nghtmre at San Jose Civic. NGHTMRE is a prominent name in electronic music, known for his high-energy performances that attract large crowds.

item.description: 2025-12-12 03:00 — The Bouncing Souls at The UC Theatre. The Bouncing Souls are a beloved punk band with a reputation for energetic live shows, making this a great pick for punk rock fans.
